ygData.subject: Re: Newbie seeking advice
ygData.msgSnippet: - ... Your mage friend will love jig for the mana replenishing aspects it has...twist it with chant of battle til you get hymn of restoration. Chords are nice
ygData.messageBody:
-

>So anyway, now that I've gone and bad-mouthed bards to my fellow
>adventurers, they're all looking at my character as the weak link in the
>group. Any advice on how best to group with a cleric, wizard, and
>warrior? I'm at level 5 now and will probably join the wizard right away.
>I don't think we'll be joined by the warrior or cleric until level 8 or so
>though.
>
>Thanks
>Evulia of Tunare
>and Kingbird of Brell Serilis


Your mage friend will love jig for the mana replenishing aspects it
has...twist it with chant of battle til you get hymn of restoration. Chords
are nice but dangerous as can attract too muuch attention! When you hit 8
and join with your warrior friend try chant/ lament or chant/ lament / hymn
if you can get 3 up.. just an old timers views on low lvl songs. Once you
hit 10 anthem replaces chant in your arsenal..12 ad a bellow to the lineup
as an alternative....Selo is of course an ALWAYS memmed song for those tight
spots! Good luck to you..we will be rooting for you!

Elyana Silvanae
Bardesss of the 35th Chorus
Ambassador to the Ridgerunners
Innoruuk Server
